resources.string: The only way to close this dialog is by\n pressing one of the following buttons.\n Do you understand?
\nThis is text set by the gtw style.\n
\nThis is text set by the default theme fontPath.\n
\nThis has a font path set to Roboto Bold, on the View.\n
\nThis has a fontPath set to a font file that does not exist, it goes back to the default.\n
\nThis has the font path defined in the style as Roboto Condensed.\n
\nThis has the font path defined in the Styles TextAppearance as Roboto Condensed.\n
\nThis has the font path defined in the Views TextAppearance as Oswald.\n
\nThis has the font path defined in the Views TextAppearance as Oswald. textAllCaps is applied.\n
\nThis is a custom TextView with Oswald font.\n
\nThis is a TextView inflated from a ViewStub.\n
\nThis is a TextView inflated from a ViewStub w/ fontPath declared.\n
\nCustom View Style, taken from a Custom style attribute.\n

Today, i am happy to announcements finally release my basic framework for android development to use with latest java feature java8, RxJava RxAndroid and DataBinding. 

 - this framework included feature is 
 1. MVVM architecture. 
 2. Dialog. 
 3. Photo Picker. 
 4. Font. 
 5. Permission. 
 6. Preference. 
 7. Validation. 
 8. Location. 
 9. File Picker. 
 10. RecycleView Adapter. 
 11. Log-cat. 
 12. Image Compressor. 
 13. Drawable Color Change. 
 14. EventBus
